metadata.title: CVE-2021-47149 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: net:fujitsu: fix potential null-ptr-deref In fmvj18x_get_hwinfo(), if ioremapfails there will be NULL pointer deref. To fix this, check the return valueof ioremap and return -1 to the caller in case of failure.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-47149` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.4.0-80-generic - 5.4.0-80.90
linux-image-5.4.0-80-generic-lpae - 5.4.0-80.90
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-80-generic - 5.4.0-80.90
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-80-lowlatency - 5.4.0-80.90
No subscription required

linux-image-5.15.0-33-generic - 5.15.0-33.34~20.04.1
